marklogic.body: Yes and I agree that passive solar Heating is a very viable (but not reliable) method of assisting your current system. However solar has yet to be improved enough to be able to replace the electrical requirements of the modern home. Now don't site the rare occurrences where some the grid nut job lives by recharging a couple car for light in the evening. In fact I will site one case of successful wind power from the 1970s. There was a small radio station in Oak Creek, CO that was powered by wind. Sometimes they would be Off the air for extended time periods and I'll bet you can guess why.
